Name: Marble Run 2D
About the game: Marble Run is a 2D game of creating various tracks and mazes for balls. Minimum system requirements allow the game to run easily even on the most basic PCs. Combine more than 30 unique parts and mechanisms to build tracks. Change the order and tilt angle of the parts. Create unusual tracks. This game perfectly develops logic and spatial thinking. A good way to relax and spend quality time. Stay tuned for updates. We are adding new mechanisms for building. Send screenshots and videos of your tracks to the community!
